snippet: I am confident that I am not the only person — Mormon or Christian — who has had enough of the acrimonious niggling from both sides.
abstract: Op-Ed article by David V Mason declares, in light of the public discussion about faith brought on by the candidacy of Mitt Romney, that he is a Mormon, not a Christian; rejects the notion that Mormonism needs Christianity's approval.
lead_paragraph: I am confident that I am not the only person — Mormon or Christian — who has had enough of the acrimonious niggling from both sides.

headline.seo: I’m a Mormon, Not a Christian
headline.main: I’m a Mormon, Not a Christian
